answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Hair loss could be the side effect of any medication that you are taking. It could also be due to severe anemia. If you have changed your soap, oil or shampoo, then this could also be a cause. At times post major surgery, diabetes and hypothyroidism appear due to stress and cause hair fall. Dandruff, eczema, dermatitis are the other causes.Yes, if the cause is found, hair-fall can be treated. Please consult your doctor. Take care!

title: major surgery and hair loss
